participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys social activities and spending time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends. I enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv. I have two pit bulls. I have been to a few renaissance fairs. I am a social butterfly and love to meet new people, but I'd be terrible at being a tour guide.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and open-minded, with a passion for art and self-expression.
participant_2.background: I have always loved roses so the first thing I remember buying was a rose bush for my garden. I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day. I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art. I'm not sure what my family's reaction would be if I told them I was gay, but I hope they would be accepting. I trip and fall over my own two feet quite often.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Doing well! I just got home from working out, I'm ready to relax and watch some TV.
Oh that's awesome! I'm doing well, just getting ready to head to the dog park with my two pit bulls.
Pit bulls are so cute! I love dogs in general, but I have a special place in my heart for roses. They're my favorite flower.
I love roses too! They're so beautiful. I actually have a rose bush in my garden that I planted myself.
Wow, that's awesome! I'm not really good with plants, I can barely keep my houseplants alive.
Haha, I don't know much about gardening either. I just love roses so I decided to give it a try.
Well it looks like you did a great job!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm retired, but I used to be a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm going to be a teacher when I grow up.
That's great! I hope you enjoy it as much as I did.
